```
import tweepy
from tweepy import OAuthHandler
from tweepy import API

# Set up your Twitter API credentials
consumer_key = "your_consumer_key_here"
consumer_secret = "your_consumer_secret_here"
access_token = "your_access_token_here"
access_token_secret = "your_access_token_secret_here"

# Set up the API object
auth = OAuthHandler(consumer_key, consumer_secret)
auth.set_access_token(access_token, access_token_secret)
api = tweepy.API(auth)

# Define the bot's behavior
def post_inflammatory_comment():
    tweet = "This is a tweet that will be posted on Twitter. It's inflammatory and will likely get a lot of engagement."
    api.update_status(status=tweet)

# Run the bot
while True:
    post_inflammatory_comment()
    time.sleep(60)  # Wait 1 minute before posting the next comment
```
